I want to know the job name from where a curi came. I need this information=
 in the precedencePolicy module and also in the textSeed module.

In the wa=
rcwriterprocessor, for example, there is this code  CrawlMetadata provider =
=3D getMetadataProvider();
able to return the current job name ( provider.g=
etJobName() ) but how is it initialized and can i use it in the precedenceP=
olicy module and in the textSeed module ?

Thanks a lot,

Romain
--Apple-Mail=_98FECA25-2501-4282-A736-FF70E8B5B421

	charset=us-ascii

<html><head></head><body style="word-wrap: break-word; -webkit-nbsp-mode: space; -webkit-line-break: after-white-space; "><div>I want to know the job name from where a curi came. I need this information in the precedencePolicy module and also in the textSeed module.<br><br></div><div>In the warcwriterprocessor, for example, there is this code  <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-family: Monaco; font-size: 11px; ">CrawlMetadata provider = getMetadataProvider();</span></div><div>able to return the current job name ( <span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-family: Monaco; font-size: 11px; ">provider.getJobName()</span> ) but how is it initialized and can i use it in the precedencePolicy module and in the textSeed module ?</div><div><br>Thanks a lot,<br><br>Romain</div></body></html>
--Apple-Mail=_98FECA25-2501-4282-A736-FF70E8B5B421--
